content.text:
# 1999 Colonial Classic – Draw

Thomas Enqvist
| runner =  Mark Philippoussis
| score = 6–4, 6–1
| type = no
}}
Mark Philippoussis was the defending Tennis champion, but Thomas Enqvist defeated him 6–4, 6–1, in the final.
Players
Andre Agassi (semifinals, third place)
#  Tim Henman (first round, eighth place)
#  Yevgeny Kafelnikov (first round, fifth place)
#  Goran Ivanišević (first round, withdrew due to a back injury)
#  Petr Korda (first round, sixth place)
#  Mark Philippoussis (final, second place)
#  Thomas Enqvist (champion, first place)
#  Michael Chang (semifinals, fourth place)
#  Mikael Tillström (replaced Goran Ivanišević, seventh place)
}}
